about_the_game:
Story Background

Your friend Atoo believes in exchanging sincerity for sincerity in love, always giving and pleasing girls unconditionally. However, the result is either being rejected or deceived by a scumbag, being drained of money by a woman, and being injured. He suddenly awakens and begins to seek advice on flirting skills from you. Under your words and deeds, he gradually understands the law of love. However, to your surprise, he slowly transforms into a top-notch scumbag. The women he plays with are all hurt and even commited succide. In order to retaliate and punish him, these victimized girls and their families unite to cast Atoo into an illusory world. In the cyberspace, you bravely entered this space to save your friends. Unexpectedly, the women you met here were all your girlfriends, In this dangerous and eerie cyber city, there is an extremely terriable law that constantly puts you to the test of life and death...

Main character

Happy, in reality, she is your current girlfriend

Mumu, your ex girlfriend (actually just had a few meals with you and watched two movies)

Xiaomai, your ex girlfriend (actually the woman you couldn't ask for)

Can Can, your ambiguous partner (but you don't really like her)

Xiaohan, your company colleague (seems interested in you, but you're not sure)
detailed_description:
Story Background

Your friend Atoo believes in exchanging sincerity for sincerity in love, always giving and pleasing girls unconditionally. However, the result is either being rejected or deceived by a scumbag, being drained of money by a woman, and being injured. He suddenly awakens and begins to seek advice on flirting skills from you. Under your words and deeds, he gradually understands the law of love. However, to your surprise, he slowly transforms into a top-notch scumbag. The women he plays with are all hurt and even commited succide. In order to retaliate and punish him, these victimized girls and their families unite to cast Atoo into an illusory world. In the cyberspace, you bravely entered this space to save your friends. Unexpectedly, the women you met here were all your girlfriends, In this dangerous and eerie cyber city, there is an extremely terriable law that constantly puts you to the test of life and death...

Xiaomai, your ex girlfriend (actually the woman you couldn't ask for)

Can Can, your ambiguous partner (but you don't really like her)

Xiaohan, your company colleague (seems interested in you, but you're not sure)
name: Elephant Town

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64Bits
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible

short_description: Your friend Atoo, under your guidance, gradually turned into to a master of love from a flatterer. Later, he fell into a top-notch scumbag who played with women and indulged in debauchery. In order to save his soul, you enter a cyber city space...
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
